reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: The app does not collect or maintain user data other than the data the user inputs.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not collect any personally identifiable information except for the data entered by the user.
reply.reference: It does not collect or maintain user data other than the data the user inputs. URL: https://neildalyteacher.com/mentlprivacypolicy

source_documents.excerpt:
This privacy policy governs your use of the mobile application Mentl that was created by Neil Daly. This privacy policy was last updated on December 14, 2022. If we make any changes to the policy, we will place a notice on our website or application. If you have any questions or concerns about the privacy policy, feel free to contact us at neiledaly@msn.com.
What information does the Application obtain and how is it used?
The Application itself does not transmit any personally identifiable infor...

we do not share personal information with anyone.
Do advertising companies collect data?
We do not collect or transmit user data, so no data is shared with advertising companies.
Do you use vendors or analytics providers?
No. Data is not shared with vendors or analytics providers.
Do you comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA)?
Yes. We do not solicit nor gather any data from children under the age of 13.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects only user input data such as member names, group names, etc.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects user-input data exclusively. This data includes member names, group names, etc.
reply.reference: The information entered by the user is stored only on the device on which it was entered and/or devices to which the user chooses to share. URL: https://neildalyteacher.com/mentlprivacypolicy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: No specific purpose of data collection and use is declared in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not collect or maintain any user data other than what is input by the user. There is no mention of a specific purpose for data collection and use.
reply.reference: The Application itself does not transmit any personally identifiable information about you, such as your name, address, phone number or email address. It does not collect or maintain user data other than the data the user inputs. URL: https://neildalyteacher.com/mentlprivacypolicy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Users can opt out of data collection by not using the app, as the Application itself does not transmit any personally identifiable information about the user.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the Application does not transmit any personally identifiable information, and the only data stored is what the user inputs. As a result, there is no mechanism mentioned for users to opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: The Application itself does not transmit any personally identifiable information about you, such as your name, address, phone number or email address. reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No data is shared with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that no personal information is collected or shared with anyone, including third parties.
reply.reference: We do not collect personal information, and so we do not share personal information with anyone. URL: https://neildalyteacher.com/mentlprivacypolicy.
